articles.author: Vaamanaa Sethi
articles.title: Kizi Apparels IPO: SME issue subscribed 4.58 times; check subscription status, and other details | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: The SME IPO received 1,15,44,000 application against offered 25,20,000 shares on the first day of subscription. The ready-to-wear clothing manufacturer’s IPO was subscribed over 4.58 times on the first day of bidding, according to chittorgarh.com.
articles.content: Ready-to wear clothing manufacturing Kizi Apparels initial public offerings (IPO) opened for subscription on July 30, 2024 and will close on August 1, 2024. The small and medium enterprise (SME) was … [+1599 chars]

articles.author: Kunal Manchanada
articles.title: FirstCry FY24 revenue crosses Rs 6,500 Cr; GlobalBees contributes 18.6% - Entrackr
articles.description: FirstCry received approval for its initial public offering (IPO) from the Securities Exchange Board of India (SEBI) earlier this month.

articles.title: Create Your Own Custom AI With AI Studio - Meta
articles.description: We’re rolling out AI Studio, a place for people to create, share and discover AIs to chat with – no tech skills required.

articles.title: India Cements buy to bolster UltraTech's hold over South - The Economic Times
articles.description: UltraTech Cement's acquisition of a controlling stake in India Cements, based in Chennai, aims to solidify its leading position in the highly competitive cement sector and delay the Adani Group's efforts to close the gap in the short to medium term. This move…

articles.author: Business Standard
articles.title: After Air India, Vistara announces VRS scheme for permanent ground staff - Business Standard
articles.description: Vistara VRS Scheme: In a message sent to employees on Monday, Vistara stated that all permanent ground staff -- who had worked at the airline for five continuous years -- can take part in the VRS scheme
articles.content: Vistara, which currently has about 6,500 employees on its rolls, is being merged into Air India to create a single full-service carrier.
